name: Table Tennis League
description:
Table Tennis League is the most realistic 3D Ping-Pong game that you can find in the AppStore.

*** Do you want to try? ***

Main features:
- Amazing graphics adapted to retina display.
- Multiplayer mode though Game Center or Bluetooth.
- Different opponents with different styles and levels to improve yourself.
- Realistic engine to demonstrate to others your speed, strength and cleverness.
- Choose the game mode that you prefer at any moment: quick game, league mode or multiplayer.
- Options menu to make you feel confortable during the competition.

* Enjoy it now to find out hours and hours of fun *

Are you ready for this challenge???
